package.name: rviz_3d_object_visualizer
package.description: A component for visualizing 3D object models on RViz. It consists of i) an RViz panel plugin that loads 3D object meshes and displays them on a list, allowing individual and group object visualization, and ii) a node that handles reading a MongoDB database to obtain and update the necessary object information.
